Bio

A little about me; I am finishing up my final courses of my undergraduate degree at the University of Toronto. I am pursuing an Arts & Science Degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Software Engineering. My main interests within the professional field of Computer Science and Software Development are in cybersecurity, backend development, and deployment.
